thread.title: These Photos Of Abandoned Places Around The World Are REAL Creepy
thread.title_full: These Photos Of Abandoned Places Around The World Are REAL Creepy

author: James Cave
title: These Photos Of Abandoned Places Around The World Are REAL Creepy
text:
These Photos Of Abandoned Places Around The World Are REAL Creepy Look if you dare. James Cave Lifestyle Staff Writer, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/25/2015 07:00 AM EDT ADVERTISEMENT 
There are many dangers that await those who seek out abandoned buildings around the world: rotting rafters, rusty tools and weak floors (not to mention the good chance that you could get in trouble for trespassing) -- we don't even want to think about the ghosts. 
We worked with the photography community over at EyeEm to pull out some of the creepiest photos of abandoned places we could find. Look if you dare, lest they haunt your computer. Procida, Italy
